main_definition: An item that is sought after by collectors due to its rarity, historical significance, or value.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A rare coin or stamp valued for its uniqueness and potential worth as an investment
meanings_and_examples.example: John found a 1943 copper penny at a garage sale, which is highly sought after by collectors.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Any item that people commonly gather or seek out for personal enjoyment and interest
meanings_and_examples.example: Sarah has an impressive collection of vintage postcards from different countries around the world.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An object with sentimental value, often passed down through generations as a family heirloom
meanings_and_examples.example: The antique pocket watch was once owned by his great-grandfather and has been in the family for over a century.
